text: Year 6 BC was a common year starting on Sunday or Monday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Balbus and Vetus. ==Events== * Caesar Augustus sends ferrets to the Balearic Islands to control rabbits * Tiberius is sent to Armenia. He then retires to Rhodes. == Deaths == * Consort Ban, Chinese concubine of Emperor Cheng of Han, also a poet and scholar (b. 48 BC) * Consort Feng Yuan (b. c. 48 BC) * Liu Xiang, Chinese scholar (b. 77 BC)
title: 6 BC
